Hello, and welcome to our course on Employee Engagement and Employee Relations. I’m excited to have you with us as we dive into two of the most essential aspects of modern workplace dynamics.

In this course, we’ll explore the Importance of Employee Relations in the Workplace—a crucial element for fostering a cohesive and productive work environment. Strong employee relations not only promote trust and communication but also serve as the foundation for long-term organizational success.

We’ll also discuss the Role of HR in Managing Employee Relations. Human Resources plays a pivotal role in maintaining positive relationships between employees and management. We'll examine best practices, policies, and frameworks that HR professionals use to create a healthy, collaborative workplace.

Next, we’ll cover Employee Engagement—a key factor that directly influences organizational performance. We’ll explore how increased engagement leads to better productivity, innovation, and overall business outcomes.

To further support your understanding, we’ll look at Tools and Techniques for Measuring Employee Engagement. Knowing how to assess engagement levels is essential for identifying both strengths and areas for improvement. Moreover, we’ll examine Strategies for Enhancing Employee Engagement, offering practical insights and approaches to inspire commitment, enthusiasm, and motivation within your workforce.

Finally, we’ll focus on Building a Positive Work Environment, which is vital for nurturing employee satisfaction, reducing turnover, and fostering long-term loyalty.

By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge and tools to strengthen employee relations, boost engagement, and drive your organization’s success. Let’s begin and transform the way you approach employee engagement and relations!


Discussing employee relations and employee engagement together in one online course makes sense because both concepts are deeply interconnected and play a crucial role in creating a positive work environment and driving organizational success. Here's why it’s beneficial to cover both topics in a single course:


1. Interconnectedness of Concepts:

Employee Relations focuses on the relationship between employers and employees, encompassing everything from conflict resolution and communication to fair treatment and legal compliance. Strong employee relations are the foundation for a positive work environment where employees feel respected and valued.

Employee Engagement is about how emotionally invested and motivated employees are in their work and the organization. High levels of engagement are often the result of effective employee relations. When employees feel that their concerns are addressed, their contributions are recognized, and they are treated fairly, they are more likely to be engaged.


2. Holistic Approach to HR Management:

Combining employee relations and engagement in one course allows for a more comprehensive understanding of how to manage and motivate employees. It enables HR professionals to see the bigger picture of how managing relationships directly impacts engagement levels, and how engaged employees contribute to better employee relations.


3. Strategies for Improvement:

Discussing both topics together allows for the exploration of strategies that improve both employee relations and engagement simultaneously. For example, open communication channels and conflict resolution mechanisms can enhance both relations and engagement. Recognizing and rewarding employees also strengthens both areas.


4. Efficiency in Learning:

Since both employee relations and engagement involve overlapping areas of HR practice, addressing them in a single course makes learning more efficient. HR professionals can gain insights into how improving one area can positively impact the other, leading to a more integrated approach to workforce management.


5. Practical Application:

A combined course can provide practical tools and frameworks that address both employee relations and engagement. For example, a module on conflict resolution might not only teach how to resolve disputes but also how to turn those resolutions into opportunities for increasing employee engagement.


6. Organizational Culture and Performance:

The course can help participants understand how both employee relations and engagement contribute to building a positive organizational culture. A strong culture, in turn, enhances performance, reduces turnover, and makes the organization a more attractive place to work.


In summary, discussing employee relations and employee engagement together in one online course provides a more complete understanding of how to create a positive, productive, and motivated workforce. By learning about both areas in tandem, HR professionals can develop strategies that support a healthy work environment and drive organizational success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Human Resources or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Complete Advanced Canva for Video Editing for Social Media
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the Art of Creating Professional, Engaging High Converting Videos for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, X
courseDetails.longDescription:
Complete Advanced Canva for Video Editing for Social Media: Create Stunning Videos that Captivate Your Audience

Are you ready to take your social media videos to the next level? Stop creating boring, static content and start producing captivating videos that grab attention, boost engagement, and drive results. This comprehensive "Complete Advanced Canva for Video Editing for Social Media" course will empower you to unlock the full potential of Canva's video editing capabilities, even if you're a complete beginner (though basic Canva familiarity is helpful).

This isn't just another Canva basics course. We'll dive deep into advanced techniques, exploring features most users never even touch. You'll learn how to create professional-looking videos for Instagram Reels, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube Shorts, and more, all within the intuitive Canva interface.

What you'll learn:

  • Master Advanced Keyframe Animation: Bring your videos to life with dynamic animations. Learn to control every element's movement, creating smooth, eye-catching visuals that capture attention. We'll cover everything from simple object animations to complex character movements.

  • Craft Seamless Transitions & Effects: Elevate your videos with smooth, professional transitions. Discover how to use Canva's built-in transitions and create your own custom effects to add a unique touch to your content.

  • Unlock Audio Editing Power: Don't just add music – create engaging soundscapes. Learn to mix audio tracks, add sound effects, and control volume levels to enhance the mood and impact of your videos.

  • Design Stunning Visual Effects: From subtle enhancements to dramatic transformations, you'll learn to use Canva's effects to add polish and style to your videos. Explore filters, overlays, and special effects to create a truly professional look.

  • Optimize for Every Platform: Learn the best settings and formats for exporting your videos for different social media platforms. Ensure your videos look their best on Instagram Reels, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube Shorts, and other platforms.

  • Create Engaging Video Ads & Marketing Content: Apply your new skills to create compelling video ads and marketing materials that drive conversions and boost your business.

  • Practical Projects & Real-World Examples: Throughout the course, you'll work on practical projects that reinforce your learning and allow you to apply your new skills to real-world scenarios. We'll provide examples and templates to help you get started.

  • Stay Up-to-Date: Canva is constantly evolving, and so is this course. We'll regularly update the content to reflect the latest features and best practices.

Who is this course for?

  • Anyone who wants to learn advanced Canva video editing skills.

Why Learn Canva for Video Editing?

Canva is an easy-to-use yet powerful tool that allows you to create professional videos without technical skills or expensive software. With pre-made templates, drag-and-drop editing, and a vast media library, you can quickly produce high-quality content that resonates with your audience.


Get Started Today!

By the end of this course, you’ll have the confidence and skills to create high-quality, engaging, and professional videos that drive results.

Enroll now and start creating scroll-stopping social media videos with Canva!
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to improve their video editing skills

courseDetails.title: Modelagem Financeira, Finanças e Gestão financeira no Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Curso prático de modelagem financeira, finanças e gestão financeira no Excel para formar analistas financeiros
courseDetails.longDescription:
Se você tem interesse em carreiras financeiras, como Private Equity, M&A, controle financeiro ou gestão financeira, certamente percebeu a importância fundamental da modelagem financeira em todos esses campos.

Seja elaborando um Business Plan, um relatório financeiro ou realizando uma avaliação empresarial, essa habilidade é indispensável.

Este curso abrangente sobre modelagem financeira e finanças no Excel lhe fornecerá o conhecimento, as técnicas e as melhores práticas para criar modelos claros e bem estruturados no Excel, atendendo às expectativas de bancos de investimento, fundos de private equity e equipes de gerenciamento financeiro.

Você aprenderá sobre padrões de modelação financeira e regras essenciais para alcançar resultados profissionais. O curso cobre a criação de um modelo financeiro abrangente, incluindo cenários de investimento variados, um cronograma detalhado de dívidas com diferentes modalidades de financiamento, uma tabela de Fontes e Usos bem definida, um Plano de Negócios profissional e um modelo de avaliação empresarial baseado em transações comparáveis e EBITDA normativo. Além disso, abordaremos o cálculo da Taxa Interna de Retorno (T.I.R.) e sua sensibilidade conforme os parâmetros de saída do investimento.

Não se preocupe se você ainda não está familiarizado com todos esses conceitos; explicaremos cada um deles antes de mergulharmos na modelagem financeira no Excel.

Este curso é essencial para quem busca excelência em finanças, controle financeiro ou carreiras transacionais como private equity, M&A e Transaction Services (TS).
targetAudiences: Estudantes de Finanças interessados em áreas altamente competitivas de finanças corporativas, como Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restructuring, Valuation e, claro, modelagem financeira.
Candidatos a entrevistas na área financeira que buscam prática e preparação para casos de modelagem financeira baseados em Excel.
Estagiários em finanças corporativas que desejam aprimorar suas habilidades em finanças, modelagem financeira e Excel.
Analistas juniores em finanças corporativas.
Analistas financeiros seniores que almejam melhorar sua proficiência em modelagem financeira utilizando o Excel.

courseDetails.title: Build 8 Python Apps Games and Web Application Python Master
courseDetails.shortDescription: Python Programming by Building 8 Practical Projects - Build 8 Python Apps Games Web Applications From Beginner to Expert
courseDetails.longDescription:
Want to become a Python developer? This comprehensive course will empower you to build 8 exciting projects, including games, desktop applications, and dynamic web apps. Learn Python through hands-on, practical exercises, covering essential concepts and techniques. By the end of this course, you'll have a strong portfolio and the confidence to tackle real-world Python development challenges.

What you'll learn:

This course is structured around hands-on projects, allowing you to learn by doing. You'll gain proficiency in:

  • Python Fundamentals: Reinforce your understanding of core Python concepts, including variables, data types, control flow, functions, and object-oriented programming.

  • Game Development with Pygame: Dive into the world of game development using Pygame. You'll learn how to create engaging 2D games, implement game logic, handle user input, and work with graphics and sound.

  • GUI Application Development with Tkinter: Build user-friendly desktop applications with Tkinter, Python's standard GUI framework. Learn to design interfaces, handle events, and create interactive applications.

  • Web Application Development: Explore web development  a lightweight and powerful Python web framework. You'll learn to create dynamic web applications, handle routing, work with templates, and interact with databases.


What you'll build:

Throughout the course, you'll create 8 distinct projects, including:

  • Interactive Games: Develop several games, ranging from simple arcade-style games to more complex projects, solidifying your game development skills.

  • Dynamic Web Applications: Create functional web apps, perhaps a simple blog, a task management application, or a data visualization dashboard, showcasing your web development skills. (Specific project details may vary depending on the course content)

Who this course is for:

  • Anyone who wants to learn Python by doing and create real-world projects.

Why take this course?

  • Hands-on Learning: Learn Python by building real projects, not just reading theory.

  • Practical Skills: Gain valuable skills that are in high demand in the tech industry.

  • Comprehensive Curriculum: Covers a wide range of Python development topics.

  • Expert Instruction: Learn from an experienced Python developer.

Enroll now and start your journey to becoming a Python Master!
targetAudiences: Anyone looking to enhance their Python skills with practical projects.

courseDetails.title: Modelowanie finansowe: Kompletny kurs finansów w Excelu
courseDetails.shortDescription: Praktyczny przypadek modelowania finansowego w Excel - Finanse, wycena i modelowanie finansowe
courseDetails.longDescription:
Jeśli interesujesz się karierą w finansach, taką jak Private Equity, fuzje i przejęcia (M&A), kontrola finansowa lub zarządzanie finansami, musisz zdawać sobie sprawę, że istnieje kluczowa umiejętność, którą trzeba opanować we wszystkich tych dziedzinach: modelowanie finansowe.

Nie ważne, czy tworzysz biznesplan, raport finansowy, czy dokonujesz wyceny firmy, ta umiejętność będzie niezbędna.

Ten kompleksowy kurs modelowania finansowego w Excelu dostarczy ci wiedzy, kodów i najlepszych praktyk, pozwalając na stworzenie przejrzystego, dobrze ustrukturyzowanego modelu w Excelu, który spełni oczekiwania banków inwestycyjnych, funduszy Private Equity i zespołów zarządzania finansami.

W trakcie tego szkolenia nauczysz się standardów modelowania finansowego i zasad, które należy przestrzegać, aby osiągnąć profesjonalne rezultaty.

Nauczysz się projektować kompleksowy model finansowy, obejmujący wiele scenariuszy inwestycyjnych, harmonogram długu z różnymi transzami finansowania i charakterystykami, przejrzystą tabelę źródeł i zastosowań środków, profesjonalny biznesplan oraz model wyceny firmy oparty na porównywalnych transakcjach, wykorzystując normatywną wartość EBITDA. Na zakończenie obliczymy IRR i przeprowadzimy jego analizę wrażliwości zgodnie z parametrami wyjścia z inwestycji.

Jeśli nie znasz jeszcze wszystkich tych pojęć, przedstawimy ich znaczenie przed rozpoczęciem modelowania finansowego w Excelu.

Kurs ten obejmuje podstawy finansów, które są niezbędne do opanowania, jeśli interesujesz się kontrolą finansową, analizą finansową lub karierą w sektorze transakcji (Private Equity, M&A, LBO, Transaction Services).
targetAudiences: Studenci finansów zainteresowani wysoce konkurencyjnymi obszarami finansów korporacyjnych, takimi jak Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restructuring, Valuation oraz oczywiście modelowanie finansowe.
Kandydaci do rozmowy kwalifikacyjnej w dziedzinie finansów, którzy chcą ćwiczyć i przygotować się do przypadków modelowania finansowego w Excel.
Stażystowie w dziedzinie finansów korporacyjnych, którzy chcą doskonalić swoje umiejętności finansowe, modelowania finansowego oraz obsługi Excela.
Młodsi analitycy w dziedzinie finansów korporacyjnych.
Starsi analitycy finansowi, którzy pragną zwiększyć swoją biegłość w modelowaniu finansowym z wykorzystaniem Excela.

courseDetails.title: Excel from Zero to Pro - الإيكسل من الصفر للاحتراف
courseDetails.shortDescription: كورس الإيكسل الكامل بالعربية
courseDetails.longDescription:
عندما تنضم إلى دورتنا التدريبية في الإكسل، ستحصل على تجربة تعليمية شاملة تمنحك المهارات الضرورية لتحقيق النجاح في استخدام هذه الأداة القوية لإدارة البيانات والتحليل. سنقدم لك محتوى تدريبي غني يغطي جميع جوانب برنامج الإكسل ويتيح لك فهمًا عميقًا للمفاهيم والمهارات الأساسية والمتقدمة.


ستتعلم كيفية استخدام الإكسل في سياقات مختلفة وعلى نطاق واسع، من تنظيم البيانات وإنشاء جداول حسابات إلى إنشاء رسوم بيانية ديناميكية وتحليل البيانات بشكل فعال. سنركز على تطبيقات عملية وأمثلة واقعية لاستخدام الإكسل في مجالات مثل الأعمال والمالية وإدارة المشاريع.


ستتلقى توجيهًا خطوة بخطوة لتطوير مهاراتك، بدءًا من الأساسيات وصولاً إلى الوظائف والتقنيات المتقدمة. سنعمل على تحسين قدراتك في استخدام الصيغ والدوال المدمجة وإجراء التحليلات الإحصائية وإنشاء تقارير متقدمة باستخدام الإكسل.


هذه الدورة في الإكسل مناسبة لطلاب الجامعات والمعاهد الذين يسعون لتعلم مهارات إدارة البيانات والتحليل، وكذلك للمحترفين في مجالات الأعمال والمالية الذين يحتاجون إلى استخدام الإكسل في إعداد التقارير واتخاذ القرارات الاستراتيجية. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فإن المحللين والموظفين الإداريين سيستفيدون أيضًا من هذه الدورة لتعزيز مهاراتهم في تنظيم البيانات وتقديم التقارير بشكل مؤثر. وأخيرًا، فإن رواد الأعمال سيجدون في هذه الدورة أدوات قوية لإدارة البيانات وتحليل أداء الأعمال لدعم نمو مشاريعهم واتخاذ القرارات الاستراتيجية بنجاح.


استعد لتحقيق تقدم واضح في مهارات الإكسل واكتساب الثقة في استخدام هذه الأداة الرائعة للعمل والدراسة. احجز مقعدك الآن وابدأ رحلتك نحو التفوق في استخدام الإكسل بثقة وكفاءة.
targetAudiences: المبتدئين الذين يرغبون في تعلم الإيكسل من الصفر
الطلاب والباحثين الذين يحتاجون إلى مهارات الإيكسل للدراسة والبحث
المهنيين في مختلف المجالات الذين يحتاجون إلى الإيكسل لأغراض العمل والتحليل
أصحاب الأعمال الصغيرة والمتوسطة الذين يحتاجون إلى إدارة بياناتهم وتقاريرهم
الموظفين الإداريين والمكتبيين الذين يستخدمون الإيكسل في أعمالهم اليومية.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & Generative AI: The ultimate AI course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master AI and Prompt Engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini | a comprehensive generative AI guide
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to start each day with a powerful ally?

Imagine having an incredibly skilled personal assistant, capable of handling your tasks with unmatched precision and speed.

Picture an AI that drafts your emails, writes articles and reports, creates inspiring images, analyzes complex data, codes custom solutions, and solves a multitude of problems, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.

To unlock these incredible benefits, you must first master AI.

Many people get excited, try a few prompts, only to abandon the effort without realizing AI's true potential.

This often happens because they lack the knowledge of the techniques, methods, and settings that deliver the best results.

This training is designed to equip you with the skills to communicate effectively with AI, optimize its settings, and fully leverage its capabilities. I have crafted a concise and dynamic course to help you develop the essential knowledge and skills for the optimized use of AI.


In this training, we will cover:

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers

GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers, Basics of work, Command Line & GUI, Intro to GIT for Beginners


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Importance of Git Skills for Software Developers and Effective Software Development at Enterprise Companies

Mastering Git, particularly in conjunction with platforms like GitLab and GitHub, is crucial for software developers and the overall success of software development within enterprise companies. Let's break down the significance of each skill set you mentioned:


  • Version Control: Git allows developers to track changes to code over time, creating a history of modifications. This enables easy backtracking to previous versions if errors occur or features need to be rolled back.

  • Collaboration: Git facilitates seamless collaboration among multiple developers working on the same codebase. Developers can work on different features concurrently, merge their changes, and resolve conflicts in a controlled manner.

  • Code Safety: Git acts as a safety net, allowing developers to experiment without fear of irreparably damaging the codebase. Branches and commits provide isolation for new features or bug fixes.


  • Command Line Proficiency: Understanding Git commands empowers developers to execute precise actions and troubleshoot issues effectively.

  • GUI Fluency: Graphical interfaces like those in GitLab and GitHub simplify common Git operations, making it more accessible for beginners and streamlining workflows.

  • Platform Compatibility: Familiarity with both GitLab and GitHub ensures adaptability across different development environments and collaborative projects.


  • Foundation for Growth: This introductory knowledge lays the groundwork for further exploration of Git's capabilities and advanced features.

  • Confidence Building: Mastering the basics empowers developers to contribute to projects and collaborate effectively, boosting confidence and engagement.

  • Industry Standard: Git is a ubiquitous tool in software development. Proficiency is essential for career advancement and employability.


Benefits for Enterprise Software Development

  • Enhanced Collaboration: Git facilitates effective communication and coordination among large teams, promoting efficient development and reducing bottlenecks.

  • Improved Code Quality: Version control, code reviews, and branching strategies contribute to higher code quality and fewer bugs.

  • Accelerated Development: Git's features, such as branching and merging, enable parallel development and faster release cycles.

  • Streamlined Onboarding: New developers can quickly get up to speed by accessing the project's Git repository and understanding its history.

  • Reduced Risk: Git's safety net and version control minimize the risk of code loss or corruption, protecting valuable intellectual property.


Git proficiency is indispensable for modern software developers and plays a vital role in driving successful software development at enterprise companies. Investing in Git training and fostering a culture of collaboration around Git practices yields significant benefits in terms of productivity, code quality, and overall project success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any, who want to build a career at Software Development or improve their knowledge.

Global Wealth Management and Private Banking (GWMPB) are specialized financial services catering to high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs) and ultra-high-net-worth individuals (UHNWIs). These services extend beyond traditional banking and encompass a comprehensive suite of financial solutions tailored to the unique needs and objectives of affluent clients.

Global Wealth Management focuses on managing and growing the wealth of HNWIs through a diverse range of investment strategies, including portfolio management, asset allocation, risk management, and financial planning. This holistic approach aims to preserve and enhance clients' wealth over the long term while addressing their specific financial goals, such as retirement planning, estate planning, and tax optimization.

Private Banking offers personalized banking services to HNWIs and UHNWIs. These services include bespoke banking solutions, exclusive investment opportunities, concierge services, and access to a dedicated relationship manager who understands their unique financial circumstances and aspirations. Private banks often act as trusted advisors, guiding clients through complex financial matters and providing tailored solutions to meet their evolving needs.

courseDetails.title: Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies
courseDetails.shortDescription: Introductional course, Usage of Research and Analytical Methodologies in Business and Science
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Course Author:

Cristiana Silva is a senior education technician with 4 years' experience in coordinating pedagogical and social projects in Higher Education Institutions and Private Social Solidarity Institutions. She began her work in an academic environment, where she obtained her Master's Degree in Education, in the specialization area of Adult Education and Community Intervention at the University of Minho and worked as an educational researcher, responsible for designing course curricula and managing course quality assessment processes. She is currently a learning designer at the Polytechnic of Cávado and Ave in Barcelos. With a passion for adult education, she has also been president of the C.R.I.A. Dialogues Association since 2021.


The short course "Research Methodologies" aims to provide an introductory understanding of scientific research in Administration. This course equips students with the necessary skills to design, develop, and evaluate research plans. As future business managers, students should be able to use data collection techniques and instruments to develop or improve business strategies, such as questionnaires, interviews, and document analysis.

At the end of the course, students should be able to:

  • Understand the characteristics of management research.

  • Explain techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data.

  • Write, present, and disseminate scientific work.

  • Understand ethical principles in research.

  • Prepare bibliographical references.


The structure of the search methodologies course:

  • Characteristics and paradigms of management research

  • Techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data

  • Research methodologies

  • Writing, presenting, and disseminating scientific work

  • Ethics in research

  • Bibliographical references


This course lays the foundation for both academic success and effective business management by equipping students with the essential skills to conduct rigorous research and analyze complex information.


1. Scientific Activity and Capstone Project Preparation

  • Research Design: The course empowers students to design robust research studies. This includes formulating clear research questions, selecting appropriate methodologies, and collecting and analyzing data systematically. These skills are crucial for scientific investigations and directly applicable to the Capstone Project, where students are expected to conduct independent research.

  • Critical Thinking and Data Analysis: Students learn to approach information critically, evaluate evidence, and draw sound conclusions. This analytical mindset is essential in science and in crafting a compelling Capstone Project that demonstrates a deep understanding of a chosen topic.

  • Scientific Communication: The course helps students develop effective communication skills, enabling them to present their findings clearly and persuasively, both in written and oral formats. This skill is vital for sharing research results within the scientific community and defending the Capstone Project before a panel.


2. Application in Real Business and Management

  • Informed Decision-Making: In the business world, decisions must be based on solid evidence. The course equips students with the tools to conduct market research, analyze competitor strategies, and evaluate the effectiveness of various business initiatives. This data-driven approach minimizes risks and maximizes opportunities.

  • Problem-Solving: Businesses constantly face challenges. The course teaches students to identify problems, gather relevant data, analyze the root causes, and develop effective solutions. This structured problem-solving approach is invaluable for managers at all levels.

  • Performance Evaluation: The ability to measure and compare results is essential for continuous improvement. The course enables students to track key performance indicators, identify trends, and make data-driven adjustments to optimize business outcomes.

  • Innovation and Adaptation: The business landscape is constantly evolving. The course fosters a mindset of curiosity and inquiry, encouraging students to stay abreast of new developments, conduct research, and adapt their strategies to remain competitive.


"Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies" provides students with a versatile skillset that is crucial for both academic and professional success. By emphasizing rigorous research, critical thinking, and effective communication, the course empowers students to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and drive innovation in the dynamic world of business.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Business or Science

Bem-vindo ao Curso: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da IBM, Intel e Microsoft, e membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 213 países e foi escolhido por mais de 560 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva é uma profissional distinta com uma sólida combinação de experiência académica e empresarial, especializada em gestão, ética, desenvolvimento estratégico e liderança. Obteve o Doutoramento em Gestão pela Universidade Lusíada de Lisboa, onde se destacou nas áreas de gestão empresarial, e-commerce, análise crítica de modelos de gestão e metodologias de investigação avançadas, recebendo grande reconhecimento pelas suas contribuições na área.

Atualmente, exerce funções como Gestora de Projetos na Associação Portuguesa de Ética Empresarial (APEE). Este papel sublinha o seu compromisso com a promoção da inovação ética e da sustentabilidade nas organizações e nos setores público e privado.

Relativamente à sua área académica, Ana Saraiva fez contribuições significativas como consultora e investigadora no centro de investigação COMEGI da Universidade Lusíada. Colaborou com prestigiadas instituições nacionais e internacionais, incluindo o IST (Universidade de Lisboa) e várias universidades europeias, avançando na investigação e implementando soluções inovadoras nas práticas de gestão organizacionais. A sua experiência editorial inclui a gestão e indexação de revistas científicas em plataformas como Scopus, DOAJ e outras de prestígio, refletindo a sua dedicação nos elevados padrões académicos.

Com uma experiência empresarial de mais de uma década, Ana trabalhou na hotelaria de luxo, onde liderou esforços na coordenação de eventos, na garantia de qualidade e na satisfação dos hóspedes. Possui um histórico comprovado de melhoria da excelência operacional e gestão estratégica, sendo uma líder versátil e capaz de impulsionar resultados nos mais diversificados contextos.

A produção académica de Ana Saraiva é vasta, incluindo numerosos artigos revistos por pares e apresentações em conferências que abordam questões críticas em gestão, ética e transformação digital. É proficiente numa ampla gama de ferramentas e plataformas digitais, como SPSS, SAS e NVivo, utilizadas para otimizar os resultados de investigação e de negócios.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso com práticas éticas e sustentáveis, Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva dedica-se a capacitar organizações e indivíduos para alcançar a excelência através de soluções inovadoras e liderança responsável no panorama global dos negócios.


O que é Gestão de Projetos?

Gestão de projetos é a aplicação organizada de conhecimentos, processos, habilidades e ferramentas para guiar um projeto desde o seu início até a sua conclusão bem-sucedida. Envolve:

  • Definir metas: Decidir o que o projeto deve alcançar.

  • Planejamento: Mapear as etapas e os recursos necessários.

  • Execução: Colocar o plano em ação, direcionar a equipe e gerenciar os recursos.

  • Monitoramento e controle: Acompanhar o progresso, gerenciar mudanças e resolver problemas.

  • Encerramento: Revisar o projeto, documentar os resultados e aprender com a experiência.


O que é Gestão de Projetos de Negócios?

A gestão de projetos de negócios refere-se à aplicação de princípios de gestão de projetos em um ambiente de negócios. Esses projetos se concentram em alcançar objetivos de negócios, como:

  • Lançamento de novos produtos ou serviços

  • Melhorar ou automatizar processos de negócios

  • Reestruturar departamentos

  • Implementar novos sistemas de software


O Papel da Gestão de Projetos

A gestão de projetos desempenha um papel fundamental nas empresas porque:

  • Aumenta a Eficiência: Um plano de projeto bem definido ajuda a otimizar o trabalho e evitar o desperdício de esforço.

  • Garante Resultados: A gestão de projetos mantém o foco em cumprir as metas definidas dentro das restrições de tempo e orçamento.

  • Gerencia Riscos: Problemas potenciais são antecipados e mitigados por meio de planejamento e monitoramento cuidadosos.

  • Melhora a Comunicação: Canais de comunicação claros entre membros da equipe, stakeholders e clientes ajudam a evitar mal-entendidos.

  • Melhora a Satisfação do Cliente: A conclusão bem-sucedida do projeto dentro dos parâmetros acordados gera confiança com os clientes.


Por que aprender gestão de projetos é importante para as empresas?

As empresas investem no treinamento de gestão de projetos de seus funcionários porque:

  • Vantagem Competitiva: Empresas com fortes capacidades de gestão de projetos entregam projetos com mais sucesso, ganham reputação de confiabilidade e superam os concorrentes.

  • Reduz Custos: Projetos ineficientes custam mais devido a atrasos e desperdício de recursos. A gestão de projetos ajuda a otimizar os recursos.

  • Melhora o Moral dos Funcionários: Projetos bem administrados minimizam o estresse, melhoram a colaboração da equipe e criam um senso de realização.

  • Melhora a Inovação: A gestão de projetos estruturada permite gerenciar projetos de inovação, levando a uma cultura de inovação dentro da empresa.


Como as habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos impulsionam sua carreira

Desenvolver suas habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos pode melhorar significativamente suas perspectivas de carreira:

  • Alta Demanda: Gerentes de projeto são procurados em todos os setores, como TI, construção, saúde, etc.

  • Melhor Salário: Gerentes de projeto qualificados geralmente ganham salários mais altos devido à sua experiência.

  • Potencial de Liderança: A gestão de projetos fornece uma base sólida para assumir funções de liderança dentro das organizações.

  • Versatilidade: As habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos se aplicam a uma ampla gama de empregos e funções, não apenas a cargos de gerenciamento de projetos.

  • Crescimento Pessoal: Você desenvolverá habilidades organizacionais, de resolução de problemas e de comunicação, tornando-se um trunfo para qualquer equipe.

Definição e Importância da Gestão

Gestão é o processo de coordenar e supervisionar as atividades de uma organização para alcançar seus objetivos


Envolve planear, organizar, liderar e controlar recursos, incluindo humanos, financeiros e materiais, para garantir

operações eficientes e eficazes.


Elementos-chave da gestão:

Welcome to HR 101: Designing the Candidate Experience! In this comprehensive course, we delve into the crucial realm of Human Resources with a specific focus on crafting an exceptional candidate journey. As organizations strive to attract and retain top talent, the candidate experience plays a pivotal role in shaping the employer brand and overall success.

Course Highlights:

1. Understanding the Candidate Journey: Explore the end-to-end process of a candidate's interaction with your organization. From the initial job posting to onboarding, examine each touchpoint and learn how to optimize them for a positive experience.

2. Building a Compelling Employer Brand: Uncover the strategies behind creating a strong employer brand that resonates with potential candidates. Learn how to effectively communicate company culture, values, and opportunities to attract the right talent.

4. Utilizing Technology in Recruitment: Explore cutting-edge HR technologies and tools that enhance the recruitment process. From applicant tracking systems to video interviewing, understand how technology can streamline operations while improving the candidate experience.

5. Effective Interview Techniques: Master the art of conducting interviews that go beyond evaluating skills and experience. Learn how to assess cultural fit, soft skills, and potential for growth, ensuring a comprehensive evaluation of candidates.

7. Diversity and Inclusion in Recruitment: Understand the importance of diversity and inclusion in the workplace and how to integrate these principles into the recruitment process. Explore best practices for creating a diverse talent pipeline.

courseDetails.title: Migra un Sitio Web de WordPress a otro Dominio o Hosting
courseDetails.shortDescription: Migra un sitio web de WordPress a otro dominio o hosting, sin saber de programación, de forma fácil y simple.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS APRENDER A MIGRAR UN SITIO WEB DE WORDPRESS A OTRO DOMINIO O HOSTING?


Únete a nuestro curso para mostrarte cómo migrar un sitio web de WordPress completo a otro dominio o hosting, para dicho proceso, podemos utilizar uno de estos dos plugins: All in One WP Migration o SiteGround Migrator.


All in One WP Migration es un plugin que facilita la migración de un sitio hecho en WordPress de forma rápida y sencilla.


Permite exportar todo el contenido como entradas, post, plugins, base de datos, imágenes, temas, etc.


Para realizar este proceso no necesitas ningún tipo de conocimiento técnico ni de programación, ya que se realiza de una forma fácil y veloz.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin All in One WP Migration, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Instalar el plugin All-in-One WP Migration.

  • Dar clic al botón de exportar para compilar tu base de datos, archivos de medios, plugins, y temas en un archivo compacto.

  • Desempacar el archivo en la nueva ubicación o dominio con una función de “arrastrar y soltar” fácil de usar en el panel de WordPress de tu nuevo sitio web.


SiteGround Migrator es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround que nos ayuda a migrar un sitio web con WordPress a tu cuenta en SiteGround desde cualquier otra compañía de alojamiento web.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin SiteGround Migrator, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Generar un token de migración en el Site Tools de SiteGround.

  • Instalar el plugin SiteGround Migrator en tu WordPress.

  • Pegar el token de migración en el plugin para comenzar la migración.

  • Comprobar tu sitio y actualizar los registros DNS para terminar la migración.

Et pour y parvenir, j’ai conçu un parcours concis et dynamique qui vous permettra de développer les connaissances et compétences essentielles à l’utilisation optimisée de l’IA.

Au cours de cette formation, nous verrons ensemble :

- Comment formuler des requêtes claires à l’IA pour obtenir les meilleures réponses possibles

- Comment configurer ChatGPT pour qu'il devienne votre professeur, co-fondateur ou analyste de confiance.

- Comment générer de multiples idées et devenir meilleur dans votre travail, plus productif, plus rapide, plus pertinent et efficace.

- Comment profiter pleinement de la multimodalité de ChatGPT pour lui écrire, lui parler, l’écouter, lui transmettre des images et lui demander de les interpréter.

- Comment pousser Dall-e ou Copilot à générer les meilleures images possibles.

- Comment trouver des alternatives intéressantes à la version payante de ChatGPT.

- On va également explorer d’autres IA comme Copilot, Claude ou Gemini.

- On verra comment adapter ChatGPT à vos préférences et besoins spécifiques pour des réponses sur mesure.

- On va voir comment booster ChatGPT grâce aux GPTs : comment utiliser ces applications et même comment les créer sans être développeur.

- On va aussi explorer des sujets un peu plus techniques en fin de formation comme la gestion des API, le playground, l’intégration de ChatGPT sur d’autres logiciels comme Excel ou Google sheets par exemple.

- Et surtout on verra que tout ça est accessible à tous, même aux débutants.


Dans cette formation, vous trouverez :

  • Des démonstrations concrètes.

  • Des fiches techniques et guides pratiques téléchargeables.

  • Et surtout un contenu régulièrement mis à jour


En bref, vous vous apprêtez à suivre un cours clair, accessible et engageant. Assez détaillé pour couvrir les notions essentielles sans traîner en longueur. Peu importe votre niveau de départ que vous soyez débutant ou à la recherche de techniques avancées, c’est la seule formation dont vous aurez besoin pour maîtriser ChatGPT.


Qui suis-je ?

Je m’appelle Yassine Rochd, je suis le fondateur d’un organisme de formation qui a aidé des milliers d’apprenants à atteindre leurs objectifs professionnels.

Je suis également passionné par la technologie. Après un master en finance et des expériences en conseil et en fonds d’investissement, j'ai suivi une formation en développement web et passé des centaines d’heures à découvrir et utiliser des IA.

Aujourd’hui, je souhaite vous transmettre le plus clairement possible ce que j’ai appris ces dernières années.


Certification et garantie :

- En terminant cette formation, vous recevrez une certification que vous pourrez même partager sur LinkedIn.

- Cette formation est également sans risque puisque vous bénéficiez d’une garantie « satisfait ou remboursé » de 30 jours.

- Vous bénéficiez d’un accès à vie à la formation, aux ressources téléchargeables et aux futures mises à jour


Vous êtes à un clic de maîtriser une technologie extrêmement utile qui vous rendra plus efficace, plus productif, et tout simplement incontournable.



Détail des différentes sections de ce cours sur ChatGPT et l'IA :


I. Prise en main rapide de ChatGPT

Découvrez comment maîtriser rapidement ChatGPT en seulement quelques vidéos. Plongez dans l'interface intuitive de ChatGPT et apprenez à créer vos premiers prompts pour exploiter pleinement la puissance de l'IA. Que ce soit pour générer des tableaux, brainstormer, générer des idées, traduire et corriger des textes, ou encore rédiger des contenus variés, vous irez plus vite et serez plus performant avec l’IA. Découvrez comment ChatGPT peut vous assister dans votre recherche d'emploi et s'adapter à vos besoins professionnels pour accroître votre efficacité. Vous verrez que ChatGPT est capable de créer une multitude de contenus, allant des mails et lettres aux articles et posts pour les réseaux sociaux, sans oublier la rédaction de code informatique.


II. Les bases du prompt engineering

Apprenez pourquoi le prompt engineering est essentiel et comment il peut transformer ChatGPT en véritable expert. Comprenez l'importance du contexte et des objectifs pour structurer vos interactions, et découvrez comment ajuster le format et la température pour optimiser vos prompts et varier le niveau de créativité du modèle. Personnalisez vos interactions en maîtrisant le ton et le style, et bénéficiez de 5 conseils pratiques pour obtenir des réponses encore plus pertinentes de ChatGPT.

III. techniques avancées de prompt engineering

Dans cette section, on verra comment créer des prompts qui génèrent eux-mêmes d'autres prompts. On étudiera la méthode du reverse engineering, les fonctionnalités de recherche web, d’interprétation d’images et encore plein d’autres techniques avancées.


IV. Dall-e

On enchainera sur la génération d’images avec Dall-e. Vous verrez comment passer d’un résultat très moyen à des œuvres esthétiques et inspirantes, comment modifier simplement et rapidement des portions d'images et optimiser vos résultats. On étudiera également des techniques avancées qui vous permettront par exemple de créer une continuité dans la génération d’un personnage de fiction ou de bande dessinée, pour des résultats encore plus impressionnants.


V. Les solutions aux limites de ChatGPT et de l’IA

ChatGPT et les autres modèles d’intelligence artificielle présentent des limites et des faiblesses. On verra dans cette section quelles sont-elles et comment les surmonter.


VI. Fonctionnalités intéressantes sur ChatGPT

Apprenez à paramétrer les fonctionnalités de partage de vos conversations pour une utilisation collaborative de ChatGPT. Exploitez au mieux l’application mobile Chat GPT, en explorant toutes les options qu'elle offre. Enfin, découvrez les méthodes pour créer un contenu unique avec l’IA en évitant toute forme de plagiat ou contenu dupliqué.


VII. Copilot et Bing

Copilot propose plusieurs alternatives intéressantes à des fonctionnalités payantes et avancées de ChatGPT. On verra comment profiter du partenariat entre Microsoft et OpenAI pour accéder à des fonctionnalités avancées d’intelligence artificielle intégrées au moteur de recherche Bing.


VIII. Gemini, Claude, Mistral et les autres

Dans la continuité de la section précédente, on étudiera d’autres IA comme Gemini de Google ou Claude d’Anthropique. On verra leur force, leur faiblesse et on étudiera plusieurs cas d’utilisation pour savoir dans quel cas les préférer à ChatGPT.


IX. Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Adaptez ChatGPT à vos besoins et à vos attentes. Apprenez à personnaliser vos interactions en configurant vos custom instructions. Découvrez également les points de vigilance à considérer pour une utilisation optimale.


X. Les GPTs

Découvrez le fonctionnement des GPTs, ces mini applications hyperspécialisées qui peuvent parfois dépasser ChatGPT. Apprenez à créer votre propre GPT étape par étape. Maîtrisez les appels d’API pour maximiser les capacités de ChatGPT et découvrez même en fin de section comment monétiser vos GPTs et, plus largement, comment gagner de l'argent grâce à ChatGPT.


XI. Gestion d’API & Playground

Explorez le playground de ChatGPT et découvrez les nouvelles fonctionnalités qu'il offre. Apprenez à appeler l'API de ChatGPT avec des niveaux de difficulté croissants. Vous pourrez ainsi utiliser ChatGPT en dehors de l'interface, créer un chatbot sur un autre site ou même intégrer ChatGPT à d'autres logiciels comme Google Sheets ou Excel, par exemple.
targetAudiences: Toute personne souhaitant maîtriser l'IA et ChatGPT. Cette formation est tout niveau.

courseDetails.longDescription:

Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 485 000 students.


By the end of this course, you will have a thorough understanding of the regulatory environment in which banking institutions operate globally and the tools needed to ensure compliance. This knowledge will empower you to navigate the complexities of regulatory compliance confidently and effectively.

In addition to these theoretical insights, you will gain practical knowledge crucial for a career in compliance area. You will be able to identify red flags as a real compliance officer, with the skills needed to detect and address potential compliance issues proactively.


Do you want to build a global career at the Wealth Management, Private Banking and Compliance?

Join our new course from globally recognized experts: Barbara Gutsch (15+ years of international experience in banking and finance, incl. 7+ years in Swiss private banking as risk and compliance manager) and Olga Margolin (17+ years in Swiss private banking industry, as top executive and business owner, managing international client relationships).


Agenda

  • Regulatory Frameworks and Compliance Standards in a Nutshell

  • Key Requirements faced by Banking Institutions

  • Why Compliance Matters? Consequences of Non-Compliance

  • Methods of Risk Mitigation and Prevention of Compliance Violations

  • Emerging Trends and Future Outlook in Regulatory Compliance


Regulatory Compliance refers to an organization's adherence to laws, regulations, guidelines, and specifications relevant to its business processes. These rules can be external (governmental, industry-specific) or internal (company policies).


Importance of Developing Regulatory Compliance Skills for Managers and Companies:

1. Risk Mitigation:

  • Legal and Financial Penalties: Non-compliance can lead to hefty fines, lawsuits, and even criminal charges for managers. By understanding regulations, managers can proactively identify potential risks and ensure compliance, thus safeguarding their companies' financial health.

  • Reputational Damage: Regulatory violations can tarnish a company's reputation, leading to loss of customer trust, decreased sales, and difficulty attracting investors. A manager skilled in compliance can prevent such scenarios.

  • Operational Disruptions: Non-compliance can lead to business interruptions or shutdowns. Managers with a strong compliance background can ensure smooth operations by implementing effective controls and procedures.


2. Strategic Advantage:

  • Competitive Edge: Companies with robust compliance programs are often viewed as more reliable and trustworthy by customers and partners. This can translate to increased business opportunities and market share.

  • Innovation: A deep understanding of regulatory landscapes can help managers identify opportunities for innovative products or services that meet emerging compliance requirements.

  • Investor Confidence: Investors are more likely to invest in companies with strong compliance records, as it demonstrates responsible management and reduces investment risk.


3. Career Advancement for Managers:

  • Increased Employability: Regulatory compliance is a sought-after skill set across industries. Managers who possess this expertise are highly valued and have a broader range of career opportunities.

  • Leadership Roles: Compliance often involves cross-functional collaboration and strategic decision-making, making it an excellent stepping stone to senior management positions.

  • Personal Growth: Staying updated on complex regulations requires continuous learning, which contributes to professional development and enhances a manager's overall skillset.


4. Ethical and Social Responsibility:

  • Protecting Consumers and Employees: Compliance with regulations ensures that products, services, and workplaces are safe for consumers and employees.

  • Sustainability: Many regulations address environmental concerns. Complying with these rules demonstrates a commitment to sustainability and corporate social responsibility.


Developing skills in regulatory compliance is not just a matter of following rules. It's about understanding the broader impact of regulations on businesses and society. By mastering this field, managers can protect their companies, advance their careers, and contribute to a safer and more sustainable business environment.

What is Project Management?

Project management is the organized application of knowledge, processes, skills, and tools to guide a project from its beginning to its successful completion. It involves:

  • Defining goals: Deciding what the project should achieve.

  • Planning: Mapping out the steps and resources needed.

  • Executing: Putting the plan into action, directing the team, and managing resources.

  • Monitoring and controlling: Tracking progress, managing changes, and addressing issues.

  • Closing: Reviewing the project, documenting results, and learning from the experience.


What is Business Project Management?

Business project management refers to applying project management principles within a business setting. These projects focus on achieving business objectives such as:

  • Launching new products or services

  • Improving or automating business processes

  • Restructuring departments

  • Implementing new software systems


The Role of Project Management

Project management plays a critical role in businesses because it:

  • Increases Efficiency: A well-defined project plan helps streamline work and avoid wasted effort.

  • Ensures Results: Project management keeps the focus on meeting defined goals within time and budget restrictions.

  • Manages Risk: Potential problems are anticipated and mitigated through careful planning and monitoring.

  • Improves Communication: Clear communication channels among team members, stakeholders, and clients help avoid misunderstandings.

  • Improves Client Satisfaction: Successful project completion within agreed-upon parameters builds trust with clients.


Why is Learning Project Management Important for Companies?

Companies invest in their employees' project management training because:

Competitive Advantage: Companies with strong project management capabilities deliver projects more successfully, gain a reputation for reliability, and outperform competitors.

Reduces Costs: Inefficient projects cost more due to delays and wasted resources. Project management helps optimize resources.

Enhances Employee Morale: Well-run projects minimize stress, improve team collaboration, and create a sense of accomplishment.

Improves Innovation: Structured project management allows for managing innovation projects, leading to a culture of innovation within the company.


How Project Management Skills Boost Your Career

Developing your project management skills can significantly enhance your career prospects:

High Demand: Project managers are in demand across industries like IT, construction, healthcare, etc.

Better Salary: Skilled project managers often earn higher salaries due to their expertise.

Leadership Potential: Project management provides a solid foundation for taking on leadership roles within organizations.

Versatility: Project management skills apply to a wide range of jobs and roles, not just project management positions.

Personal Growth: You'll build organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills, making you an asset to any team
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Project Management

Compensation & Benefits (C&B) Management refers to the design, implementation, administration, and review of an organization's employee compensation and benefits programs. This includes everything from determining salary structures and bonuses to managing health insurance plans, retirement contributions, and other perks.


The Importance of C&B Management Skills for Your Career

  • Attracting and Retaining Talent: A well-structured C&B program can make your company more attractive to potential employees and encourage current employees to stay. This is critical for the success of any organization.

  • Employee Motivation and Productivity: A fair and competitive compensation package, along with attractive benefits, can increase employee morale, job satisfaction, and ultimately productivity.

  • Legal Compliance: C&B professionals ensure that the organization's compensation practices comply with all relevant laws and regulations, avoiding costly legal disputes.

  • Cost Control: Effective C&B management involves balancing the need to attract and retain employees with the organization's financial constraints.

  • Career Advancement: Expertise in C&B can lead to leadership positions within human resources departments or consulting roles.


C&B Management Skills and Building Your Own Business

  • Attracting and Retaining Top Talent: When starting your own business, attracting and retaining high-quality employees is essential. Strong C&B skills can help you develop competitive packages that entice top performers.

  • Cost Management: A good understanding of C&B will help you effectively manage payroll and benefits costs, which are often significant expenses for small businesses.

  • Employee Morale and Productivity: By implementing fair and rewarding compensation and benefits programs, you can foster a positive work environment, boosting employee morale and productivity.

  • Competitive Advantage: Offering a unique and attractive C&B package can differentiate your business from competitors, helping you attract the best employees and gain a competitive edge.


In summary, Compensation & Benefits Management is a multifaceted discipline that plays a crucial role in any organization's success. Whether you're pursuing a career in HR or planning to launch your own business, developing skills in this area can significantly enhance your prospects and contribute to your long-term success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Opanowanie usługi Active Directory: administracja i podstawy
courseDetails.shortDescription: Podstawowe umiejętności: Znajomość Active Directory i zarządzania zasadami grupy
courseDetails.longDescription:
**Wersja w języku polskim**


Active Directory, podstawowa technologia wprowadzona w systemie Windows 2000, pozostaje integralną częścią nowoczesnych domen, wykorzystując kluczowe koncepcje, takie jak użytkownicy, komputery, grupy i jednostki organizacyjne. Elementy te są równie ważne dzisiaj, jak były na początku administracji Active Directory.


Znajomość zarówno Active Directory, jak i Group Policy jest niezbędna dla każdego specjalisty IT lub technika helpdesku, ponieważ umiejętności te są powszechnie stosowane w dużych organizacjach z zespołami wsparcia IT. W tym kompleksowym kursie dotyczącym Active Directory i Group Policy nauczysz się:


Jak skutecznie zarządzać kontami użytkowników, grupami i jednostkami organizacyjnymi Active Directory za pomocą konsoli Użytkownicy i komputery Active Directory.


Najlepszych praktyk ustawiania i resetowania haseł kont Active Directory.


Wykorzystania funkcji wyszukiwania Active Directory w celu szybkiego znalezienia tego, czego potrzebujesz.


Efektywnego tworzenia i zarządzania zasadami grupy.


Zrozumienia znaczenia lokalnych zasad komputera w odniesieniu do zasad grupy.


Szczegółowych wyjaśnień zasad haseł użytkowników.


Jak korzystać z preferencji zasad grupy i początkowych obiektów zasad grupy.


Mechanika replikacji i rola folderu SYSVOL.


Ponadto kurs zawiera cenne skróty i samouczki dotyczące narzędzi wiersza poleceń, które będą przydatne w Twojej karierze w zakresie wsparcia IT. Znajomość najskuteczniejszego sposobu wykonania zadania może być często korzystna, zwłaszcza jeśli masz dużo do zrobienia w krótkim czasie.
targetAudiences: Technicy wsparcia IT lub pracownicy helpdesku, którzy chcą rozwijać swoją karierę

Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

Autor do curso:

O Dr. Pedro Nunes construiu uma carreira multifacetada, combinando com sucesso o mundo académico com a experiência prática no mundo dos negócios. A sua formação culminou com um Doutoramento em Análise Económica e Estratégia Empresarial, com menção "cum laude", pela Universidade de Santiago de Compostela.

Profissionalmente, o Dr. Nunes navegou por diversos setores, incluindo tecnologia, comércio internacional e consultoria, desempenhando funções que vão desde analista de negócios até diretor. Atualmente, aplica a sua vasta experiência na indústria e os seus conhecimentos académicos como Professor em vários programas de DBA, contribuindo para a formação da próxima geração de profissionais.


Definição e Importância da Gestão

Gestão é o processo de coordenar e supervisionar as atividades de uma organização para alcançar seus objetivos


Envolve planear, organizar, liderar e controlar recursos, incluindo humanos, financeiros e materiais, para garantir

operações eficientes e eficazes.


Elementos-chave da gestão:

  • Planeamento: Definir objetivos e determinar o melhor curso de ação para alcançá-los.

  • Organizar: Organizar recursos e tarefas de forma estruturada para atingir os objetivos.

  • Liderar: Direcionar e motivar as pessoas a trabalharem em prol dos objetivos da organização.

  • Controlo: Monitorizar e avaliar o progresso para garantir que os objetivos são atingidos.


Importância da Gestão:

  • Atingir Metas: A Gestão ajuda as organizações a definir e atingir os seus objetivos, garantindo que todas as atividades estão alinhadas com os resultados desejados.

  • Otimização de recursos: A gestão eficiente garante que os recursos são utilizados de forma eficaz, minimizando o desperdício e maximizando a produtividade.

  • Adaptabilidade e Inovação: As boas práticas de gestão permitem que as organizações se adaptem a ambientes em mudança e fomentem a inovação.

  • Motivação e Desenvolvimento dos Colaboradores: Uma gestão eficaz envolve liderar e motivar os colaboradores, o que aumenta a satisfação no trabalho e o crescimento pessoal.

  • Vantagem competitiva: Práticas de gestão sólidas dão às organizações uma vantagem competitiva, melhorando a eficiência, a produtividade e o desempenho geral.


LIDERANÇA:


Definição geral: A liderança pode ser vista como a arte de motivar um grupo de pessoas a atingir um objetivo comum. Implica não só a gestão de recursos, mas também inspirar e moldar o futuro das organizações.


Âmbito:  A aula abordará os aspectos fundamentais da liderança, incluindo a sua definição, significado e as várias abordagens teóricas que têm sido desenvolvidas ao longo do tempo.


Relevância moderna: A liderança é fundamentalmente uma questão de influência. Envolve a capacidade de um indivíduo para inspirar, motivar e permitir que outros contribuam para a eficácia e o sucesso da organização.


Desafios: No atual ambiente em rápida mudança, marcado pela globalização, avanços tecnológicos e desafios éticos complexos, a liderança torna-se cada vez mais crítica.


A IMPORTÂNCIA DA LIDERANÇA NAS ORGANIZAÇÕES:


Adaptação e mudança: Os líderes eficazes são essenciais para navegar através de mudanças e incertezas, orientando as organizações através de processos de transformação e adaptando-se a novos paradigmas.


Cultura e ética organizacional: Os líderes desempenham um papel crucial na formação da cultura organizacional e na promoção de um clima ético, influenciando o comportamento dos empregados e o ethos organizacional geral.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT i Sztuczna Inteligencja: Kompleksowe szkolenie z AI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Zdobądź mistrzostwo w sztucznej inteligencji: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude AI- kompletny przewodnik po sztucznej inteligencji
courseDetails.longDescription:
Kompleksowe szkolenie z ChatGPT i AI:

Czy jesteś gotowy, aby każdy dzień rozpoczynać z osobistym asystentem, który realizuje Twoje zadania z niezrównaną precyzją i szybkością? Sztuczna inteligencja, która potrafi pisać Twoje maile, artykuły czy raporty, tworzyć inspirujące obrazy, analizować skomplikowane dane, dostarczać niestandardowe rozwiązania i rozwiązywać liczne problemy, umożliwiając Ci skupienie się na tym, co naprawdę ważne.

Aby w pełni wykorzystać te korzyści, musisz opanować AI. Wiele osób ekscytuje się, realizuje 2-3 prompty i na tym kończy, nie odkrywając prawdziwego potencjału sztucznej inteligencji. Często wynika to z braku znajomości technik, metod i ustawień, które pozwalają uzyskać najlepsze wyniki z AI.

Celem tego szkolenia jest przekazanie Ci wszystkich kluczy do efektywnej komunikacji z AI, jej optymalnej konfiguracji i pełnego wykorzystania jej możliwości.

Aby to osiągnąć, opracowałem zwięzły i dynamiczny program, który pozwoli Ci zdobyć niezbędną wiedzę i umiejętności do optymalnego wykorzystania AI.

W trakcie tego szkolenia wspólnie omówimy:

  • Jak formułować jasne zapytania do AI, aby uzyskać najlepsze możliwe odpowiedzi.

  • Jak skonfigurować ChatGPT, aby stał się Twoim nauczycielem, współzałożycielem lub zaufanym analitykiem.

  • Jak generować wiele pomysłów i stawać się lepszym w swojej pracy, bardziej produktywnym, szybszym, bardziej trafnym i efektywnym.

  • Jak w pełni wykorzystać multimodalność ChatGPT, aby pisać do niego, mówić, słuchać, przekazywać obrazy i prosić o ich interpretację.

  • Jak zmusić Dall-e lub Copilot do generowania najlepszych możliwych obrazów.

  • Jak znaleźć interesujące alternatywy dla płatnej wersji ChatGPT.

  • Zbadamy także inne AI, takie jak Copilot, Claude czy Gemini.

  • Dowiemy się, jak dostosować ChatGPT do Twoich preferencji i specyficznych potrzeb, aby uzyskać niestandardowe odpowiedzi.

  • Zobaczymy, jak wzmocnić ChatGPT dzięki GPT: jak używać tych aplikacji i nawet jak je tworzyć bez bycia programistą.

  • Przyjrzymy się również bardziej technicznym zagadnieniom na końcu szkolenia, takim jak zarządzanie API, playground, integracja ChatGPT z innymi programami jak Excel czy Google Sheets.

I przede wszystkim, zobaczymy, że to wszystko jest dostępne dla każdego, nawet dla początkujących.

W tym szkoleniu znajdziesz:

  • Konkretne demonstracje.

  • Arkusze techniczne i praktyczne przewodniki do pobrania.


[Aktualizacja: Dodałem filmy dotyczące użycia modelu GPT-4o, który jest następcą wersji GPT-4]

W skrócie, przystępujesz do jasnego, dostępnego i angażującego kursu. Jest on wystarczająco szczegółowy, aby pokryć kluczowe pojęcia, bez zbędnego przeciągania. Niezależnie od Twojego poziomu zaawansowania, czy jesteś początkujący, czy szukasz zaawansowanych technik, to jedyne szkolenie, jakiego potrzebujesz, aby opanować ChatGPT.


Moja prezentacja:

Nazywam się Yassine Rochd, jestem założycielem organizacji szkoleniowej, która pomogła tysiącom osób osiągnąć ich cele zawodowe.

Jestem także pasjonatem technologii. Po ukończeniu studiów magisterskich z finansów i doświadczeniu w konsultingu oraz funduszach inwestycyjnych, odbyłem szkolenie z zakresu web developmentu i spędziłem setki godzin na odkrywaniu i używaniu AI.

Dziś chcę przekazać Ci w jak najjaśniejszy sposób to, czego nauczyłem się przez ostatnie lata.


Certyfikacja i gwarancja:

Po ukończeniu tego szkolenia otrzymasz certyfikat, który będziesz mógł udostępnić na LinkedIn.

Szkolenie jest również bez ryzyka, ponieważ obejmuje 30-dniową gwarancję satysfakcji lub zwrotu pieniędzy.

Masz dożywotni dostęp do szkolenia, zasobów do pobrania oraz przyszłych aktualizacji.

Jesteś o krok od opanowania niezwykle przydatnej technologii, która uczyni Cię bardziej efektywnym, produktywnym i po prostu niezastąpionym.


Szczegółowy opis poszczególnych sekcji tego kursu:

Szybki start z ChatGPT

Dowiedz się, jak szybko opanować ChatGPT w zaledwie kilku filmach. Zanurz się w intuicyjny interfejs ChatGPT i naucz się tworzyć pierwsze prompty, aby w pełni wykorzystać moc AI. Niezależnie od tego, czy chcesz generować tabele, brainstormować, generować pomysły, tłumaczyć i poprawiać teksty, czy też pisać różnorodne treści, z AI będziesz działać szybciej i wydajniej. Zobacz, jak ChatGPT może pomóc w poszukiwaniu pracy i dostosować się do Twoich potrzeb zawodowych, aby zwiększyć efektywność. Zobaczysz, że ChatGPT jest w stanie tworzyć mnóstwo treści, od maili i listów po artykuły i posty na mediach społecznościowych, nie zapominając o pisaniu kodu komputerowego.

Podstawy prompt engineering

Dowiedz się, dlaczego prompt engineering jest kluczowy i jak może przekształcić ChatGPT w prawdziwego eksperta. Zrozum, jak ważny jest kontekst i cele w strukturze interakcji, oraz jak dostosować format i temperaturę, aby zoptymalizować prompty i zmieniać poziom kreatywności modelu. Personalizuj swoje interakcje, opanowując ton i styl, i skorzystaj z 5 praktycznych wskazówek, aby uzyskać jeszcze bardziej trafne odpowiedzi od ChatGPT.

Zaawansowane techniki prompt engineering

W tej sekcji zobaczymy, jak tworzyć prompty, które same generują inne prompty. Przestudiujemy metodę reverse engineering, funkcje wyszukiwania w sieci, interpretacji obrazów i wiele innych zaawansowanych technik.

Dall-e

Przejdziemy do generowania obrazów za pomocą Dall-e. Zobaczysz, jak przejść od przeciętnego wyniku do estetycznych i inspirujących dzieł, jak prosto i szybko modyfikować fragmenty obrazów i optymalizować wyniki. Zbadamy również zaawansowane techniki, które pozwolą na przykład na tworzenie ciągłości w generowaniu postaci fikcyjnych lub komiksowych, dla jeszcze bardziej imponujących rezultatów.

Rozwiązania dla ograniczeń ChatGPT i AI

ChatGPT i inne modele sztucznej inteligencji mają swoje ograniczenia i słabości. W tej sekcji omówimy, jakie są te ograniczenia i jak je przezwyciężyć.

Ciekawe funkcje ChatGPT

Naucz się konfigurować funkcje udostępniania swoich rozmów dla wspólnej pracy z ChatGPT. Wykorzystaj w pełni aplikację mobilną Chat GPT, eksplorując wszystkie oferowane opcje. Odkryj metody tworzenia unikalnych treści za pomocą AI, unikając plagiatu i duplikacji treści.

Copilot i Bing

Copilot oferuje kilka interesujących alternatyw dla płatnych i zaawansowanych funkcji ChatGPT. Zobaczymy, jak skorzystać z partnerstwa Microsoftu i OpenAI, aby uzyskać dostęp do zaawansowanych funkcji sztucznej inteligencji zintegrowanych z wyszukiwarką Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral i inne

W kontynuacji poprzedniej sekcji zbadamy inne AI, takie jak Gemini od Google czy Claude od Anthropic. Zobaczymy ich mocne i słabe strony oraz zbadamy różne przypadki użycia, aby wiedzieć, kiedy lepiej wybrać je zamiast ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Dostosuj ChatGPT do swoich potrzeb i oczekiwań. Naucz się personalizować swoje interakcje, konfigurując swoje custom instructions. Odkryj również, na co zwracać uwagę, aby optymalnie korzystać z AI.

GPTs

Poznaj działanie GPTs, tych mini aplikacji wyspecjalizowanych, które czasem mogą przewyższać ChatGPT. Naucz się krok po kroku tworzyć własne GPT. Opanuj wywołania API, aby maksymalizować możliwości ChatGPT, a na końcu sekcji dowiedz się, jak monetyzować swoje GPTs i szerzej, jak zarabiać dzięki ChatGPT.

Zarządzanie API i Playground

Zbadaj playground ChatGPT i odkryj nowe funkcje, które oferuje. Naucz się wywoływać API ChatGPT o różnym poziomie trudności. Będziesz mógł używać ChatGPT poza interfejsem, tworzyć chatboty na innych stronach lub nawet integrować ChatGPT z innymi programami, takimi jak Google Sheets czy Excel.
targetAudiences: Kurs jest przeznaczony dla każdego, kto chce opanować AI i ChatGPT. Jest odpowiedni dla wszystkich poziomów zaawansowania.

Elementor es un plugin gratuito para WordPress que sirve para crear y maquetar páginas web con todo tipo de diseños a través de un editor visual de tipo drag and drop que permite arrastrar y añadir elementos de manera sencilla y rápida, simplifica de manera extraordinaria el diseño de páginas web con WordPress, sobre todo para personas que no son expertas en código y programación web y quieren crear sitios desde cero sin las limitaciones del constructor nativo de WordPress.


Además, Elementor posee una interfaz intuitiva y muy visual que permite trabajar a tiempo real sobre el frontend, es decir, sobre el diseño de la página en la parte visual.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un sitio web con WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor, que llevará el diseño de su sitio web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web en WordPress, con el constructor visual de Elementor, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu sitio web con WordPress y Elementor.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear sitios web profesionales con WordPress y Elementor.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu sitio web de forma profesional.

  • Cómo crear una página de blog para tu sitio web.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu sitio web.

  • Cómo adaptar tu sitio web para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).

  • Cómo agregar el chat de Facebook Messenger en tu sitio web.


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Página web con WordPress y Elementor", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un sitio web con WordPress y Elementor de forma rápida y sencilla.



¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender en el constructor visual de Elementor.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca
